BaseProcessEstimator

Base class for all process estimators in skpm.
class skpm.base.BaseProcessEstimator[source]

Bases: sklearn.base.BaseEstimator

Base class for all process estimators in skpm.

This class implements a common interface for all process, aiming at standardizing the validation and transformation of event logs.

For instance, all event logs must have a case_id column.

_validate_log(X: pandas.DataFrame, y: pandas.DataFrame = None, reset: bool = True, cast_to_ndarray: bool = False, copy: bool = True)[source]
_ensure_case_id(columns: list[str])[source]
